message.body: Titan is cold and I don't know if I can get him an additional blanket quickly. Is there any chance that lucky wore a 78?
If so could we borrow your heaviest or one with hood?
We will clean them for you and repay you if any damage
Poor pony! I've got a 78 medium, my hood is light but it works with the medium
Or I'm home if you're coming by this way?
Yes I am out of town. I'm in Memphis. Maybe with your medium and light hood he will be warmer. Kenzie has three blankets on him. I ordering a heavy now
He has three mediums on now. I feel awful.
Geez! I'll bring mine out tomorrow and I'll see what's up. 2 mediums and a hood maybe? I'll let you know!
He was super sweaty last week, I would've too! Not to worry, we'll get him bundled up and it's gonna be warmer starting tomorrow
